error.signature: An error occurred (ResourceNotFoundException) when calling the GetSecretValue operation

verdict.summary: Secrets Manager secret doesn't exist or has been deleted.

dead_ends.action: Creating a new secret with the same name immediately after deletion
dead_ends.why_fails: Deleted secrets have a recovery window (7-30 days) during which the name is reserved

dead_ends.action: Hardcoding the secret value in code
dead_ends.why_fails: Security violation; secrets in code get committed to version control

workarounds.action: Verify the secret name and region: aws secretsmanager list-secrets --region <region>
workarounds.how: Secret names are case-sensitive and region-specific

workarounds.action: If recently deleted, restore it: aws secretsmanager restore-secret --secret-id <name>
workarounds.how: Secrets in the recovery window can be restored

frequently_confused_with.distinction: ResourceNotFoundException on GetSecretValue means the secret name/ARN doesn't exist or is in a different region; ProvisionedThroughputExceededException means DynamoDB read/write capacity was exceeded
